channel.title: BeastxPk 667 RSPS
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3nPvWA9Vobw
This is a 667 rsps owned by "Beast." This server is 1/3 spawn. Once you log in, you can do ;;master. After that, other commands are ;;melee,range,mage,hybid. This is mainly a pk server and pvm. Every monster is coded in our server, besides nex, nex is currently undergo for coding. Staff is especially needed. We are in need of mature staff members. Our server is VPS hosted. And average about 10-15 players a day. our server came out 6/15/2013. I could say we are doing pretty well but we could do better! [/COLOR] - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Old and new Runescape Armor - DonatorZone (with shops) - Various shops. - Frost Dragons - Tormented Demons - New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Curses, ancients etc. - King Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - DICING/GAMBLING - Working clan wars! - Great staff and community - fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Auto-Voting - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - unique home
Website- http://beastxpk.forumotion.com/
Client download- http://www.mediafire.com/?87oh9ashp98v86x
or
- https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/...5/BEASsTPK.jar
Either is fine, updated one is Mediafire.
Join now!

item.description:
@Lucky_dds wrote:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3nPvWA9Vobw

This is a 667 rsps owned by "Beast." This server is 1/3 spawn. Once you log in, you can do ;;master. After that, other commands are ;;melee,range,mage,hybid. This is mainly a pk server and pvm. Every monster is coded in our server, besides nex, nex is currently undergo for coding. Staff is especially needed. We are in need of mature staff members. Our server is VPS hosted. And average about 10-15 players a day. our server came out 6/15/2013. I could say we are doing pretty well but we could do better!
[/COLOR]
